header.notfound_input_title: Alas, no such product has been found.
header.notfound_input_text: Unfortunately, we could not find this product in the catalog. You can leave a request so that we add this product to our catalog.

home.delivery_of_products_introbanner_subtitl: From the nearest store within a radius of 1 km!

wrong.something_error-subtitle: If you have any problems with the service, please contact us:

notfound.notfound_subtitle: You haven't broken the internet, but we can't find what you're looking for.

product_category.empty_title: Oops. Looks like it's still empty
product_category.empty_subtitle: Our entire team is working hard to complete this category. Come back in a while and the category will be filled with products :)

cart.not_products_description: The items you order will appear here.
cart.confirm_remove_btn: Are you sure you want to empty the trash? All items will be removed from the cart

checkout.header_title: Your order has been placed successfully
checkout.header_text: We have completed your order. Please wait for a call from our courier to confirm your order. Thanks for shopping.

mapModal.head_text: Since Dassyor moves everything very quickly to certain delivery areas, the assortment may vary in your area.
